report_header.title: System Impact Projection Report – Azori Operating Network
report_header.description: Analysis of structural, operational, and cognitive impacts following Tier-9 Core Registry Lock-In (00 GENESIS + 01 WATCHTOWER).

overview.summary: The Azori Operating Network (AON) transitions from static architecture to a harmonized, multi-layered cognitive network. Each layer—Core, Subcore, Runtime, Fusion—now integrates through self-auditing manifests and indexes.

core_layer.change: Fixed governance chain: Genesis → Watchtower → Quantum → Fractal → Post
core_layer.benefit: Predictable system life-cycle; stable supervision and recovery path

runtime_layer.change: Canary loader and preflight patch validation system integrated
runtime_layer.benefit: Safe experimentation, modular updates, and autonomous patch management

subcore_layer.change: Introduced domain/sub-domain GPT registries (Market, Crypto, Sports)
subcore_layer.benefit: Parallel specialization and independent calibration of verticals

fusion_layer.change: Fusion Cell Law applied as governing cognitive structure
fusion_layer.benefit: Ensures coherence and stability via Vector–Mirror–Core harmonics

operational_throughput.comment: Layered manifests reduce routing and initialization overhead

stability_drift.comment: Adaptive HASHLOCK v3 and Watchtower audits stabilize drift

cognitive_bandwidth.comment: Parallel domain chains allow higher reasoning concurrency

architectural_effects: Unified Signal Topology – Watchtower harmonizes global telemetry paths.
Adaptive Runtime Evolution – Canary Loader + Boot Validator enable self-testing patch deployment.
Recursive Memory Framework – Genesis + Fractal Calibration close cognitive loops.
Distributed Cognitive Fabric – Fusion Cell Law propagates reasoning consistency network-wide.

governance_and_maintainability.audit_readiness: Full manifest lineage and checksum tracking active.
governance_and_maintainability.upgrade_path: Tier-10 migration supported by additive layering (no redesign required).
governance_and_maintainability.recovery_protocol: Watchtower + Post Mortem maintain auto-healing under checksum failure or drift detection.

summary.statement: The Azori Operating Network now operates as a modular, self-auditing cognitive architecture. Core stabilization and runtime governance establish a living framework capable of recursive growth without drift.

meta.notes: Use this report as baseline for Tier-10 harmonization testing and cross-domain signal mapping.
